prompt: Create a clean privacy policy page with a white background and a card-based layout for a modern, structured look. Display a 'Privacy Policy' title at the top in a large, bold black font, aligned to the left. Include a back button in the top-left corner with a black icon. Below the title, add a brief introductory paragraph in dark gray text inside a card with subtle elevation. Create four sections with subheadings ('Data Collection', 'Data Usage', 'Data Security', 'Contact Us') in bold black text, each inside its own card with a light gray background and rounded corners. Each section should have a paragraph in dark gray text. Use 20-pixel padding and 16-pixel spacing between cards. At the bottom, place an 'Accept' button with a teal background and white text, and a 'Decline' button with a transparent background and teal border, centered. The layout should be scrollable with a Column layout.
